description:
Since our firm's founding, the attorneys at the law firm of Tanzillo, Stassin and Babcock, have focused their efforts on providing a wide range of high-quality legal services to the residents of Northwest Indiana. From our law office in Dyer, we regularly serve clients from the Gary metropolitan area and surrounding Lake and Porter counties who have legal needs in the following practice areas:

  • Personal injury law
  • Family law
  • Criminal law
  • Bankruptcy
  • Estate planning
  • Probate

Our law firm is home to four experienced attorneys with nearly 80 years of combined experience and a full support staff, who work together to provide outstanding services to all of our clients, regardless of their needs.

Whether you need an attorney to represent you in civil court, criminal court, bankruptcy court or family court, look no further than the law firm of Tanzillo, Stassin and Babcock If you need advice for creating an estate plan or you need a lawyer to guide you through the probate process, we can help you as well. Regardless of the challenge you face, you can learn more about how we can help you by scheduling a free initial consultation at our Dyer law office.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
